channel.title: Math & Stats on Hila Calderon
channel.description: Recent content in Math & Stats on Hila Calderon

item.title: News Classifier App.
item.description: Tools: Python, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Pyplot News Classifier Tools: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Itertools, Sklearn Summary In this research project we took a political dataset from the 2016 US Presidential elections and created a machine learning model using Python to classify the news as REAL or FAKE. We implemented a TfidfVectorizer, initialized a PassiveAggressiveClassifier, and fit our model. Finally, we run an uncertainty evaluation of the model to obtain the level of accuracy.

item.title: Data analytical review of the 911 Call incindents in 2016: Pennsylvania, US.
item.description: Tools: Python, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Pyplot In this research I am analyzing the 911 call dataset. Access to the source code here Data Source: Kaggle. The data contains the following fields( all are declared as a String variable): lat : Latitude lng: Longitude desc: Description of the Emergency zip: Zipcode title: Title timeStamp: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS twp: Township addr: Address e: Dummy variable (always 1) For the data analysis and visualisation we import all the dependencies.
